interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.WindStrength
interface.description: This interface is for controlling wind strength of a device.

property.name: MaxStrength
property.description: Maximum strength allowed for target wind strenghth

property.name: AutoMode
property.description: Represent enabled/disabled state of the auto mode.

method.name: SetWindStrength
method.description: Invoke this method to set wind strength

method.name: GetWindStrengthInfo
method.description: Invoke this method to get information about wind strength in string format

method.name: EnableAutoMode
method.description: Invoke this method to enable/disable the auto mode
